name: EVACUATE (chadh)
description:
You're a scientist caught in the aftermath of a catastrophic event. Evacuate quickly before you're swallowed by the rising tide of disintegrating antimatter!

A Platformer made for the 2021 CSSA Game Jam, where the theme was "Don't stop moving!"

CONTROLS  Movement
  • Left/Right arrow keys to move
  • Up/Down arrow keys to climb
    • Note that climbing is limited -- hold on too long and you'll fall off!
  • 'Z' to jump
Etc
  • 'R' to Restart the current stage
  • 'M' to mute the background music
  • Hold ESCAPE to quit
  • F4 to toggle full screen
    • (Or drag the window to resize)

If you get stuck, press backspace to skip the current stage (but your stats won't be tracked!)

Game made in GameMaker Studio 2.

Art created in Aseprite.

Music created in Famitracker-0CC.
